snippet.title: Gal*Gun 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit the official website: http://www.pqube.co.uk/galgun2
Pre-order now on PS4: https://www.amazon.co.uk/pqube-FG-GAL2-PS4-ESI-Gal-Gun-PS4/dp/B077N513Q8
Pre-order now on Switch: https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B077PCVVC9/

Gal*Gun is back for an adventure more outrageous than ever! A new army of girls has been overpowered by lust in THE FULL-FRONTAL SEQUEL to Japan's infamous shooter. Fend them off with your Pheromone Shot and use new gadgets to expel demons from their bodies in the most audacious first-person shooter you'll ever play!

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! 
https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU
